# ben

verb suffix (reanalysed ⇨ -en)
verb suffix 1. person singular ⋍ Ich bin

ben : Bengel (son)
bin : son of ⇔ born Torben < Thorbjørn bon > von (abstract genitive)
ben > ב binnen by … (locative) > in

bene bien bon

𒁀𒉡 | ba-nu | good, …
𓃀 𓄤 | good | good
𓃀 𓇜 𓈖 | sweet, pleasant |

see good

𒁀𒉡 ba-nu •bauen
𒁀𒉡 to create

𒁀𒌋𒌆𒌅 ba-tul-tu
𒁀𒌋𒌆𒌅 adolescent, nubile girl
